Posts.Content: PS - what I was meaning to say is that he didn't have a problem with having needing many piccs - each time they just chose the opposite arm to the time before.
Posts.Title: Replacement PICC line

Posts.Content: Hi my husband had 3 (or maybe 4) diff Piccs over last year.  Like you he has terrible veins - they "look" all bold n bulging but collapse when the needle goes in.   I dont normally lurk in the Breast Cancer forum but I saw your question as I logged into MacMillan home screen.
Posts.Title: Replacement PICC line
